name: Giant Eagle
description: A Giant Eagle is a majestic creature with a wingspan that can reach up to 20 feet, characterized by its keen eyesight and sharp talons.
memorable: Its presence symbolizes freedom and nobility, and it often forms close bonds with good-aligned humanoids, acting as a guardian or mount.
goals: Typically hunts for large prey and acts as a protector for its allies.
relations: Often seen alongside good-aligned humanoids, serving as companions or guardians.
environment: High mountains or wide open skies.
strengths: Exceptional at scouting due to its Keen Sight ability, allowing it to see exceptionally well and have advantage on perception checks that rely on sight.
weaknesses: Struggles with prolonged combat due to average Constitution and potential vulnerability if submerged while swimming.
attacks: Utilizes sharp beak and talons in combat, combining agile flight with powerful melee strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Heightened Sight, granting superior perception capabilities and allowing it to detect hidden creatures or objects effectively.
senses: Possesses heightened sight, improving its perception to a remarkable 19 when relying on vision alone.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +4 bonus, allowing it to excel in detecting hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can swim up to 40 feet but must transition to flying or end on solid ground.
Capable of grappling Medium or smaller targets with its Talons attack.
Can communicate in its own language, Giant Eagle.
Typically found in pairs, raising young in nests.
Commonly associated with noble and heroic characters.
test_queries: noble eagle and guardian for warriors
